text: Rio 2 (also known as Rio 2: Jungle Fever) is a 2014 computer animated movie made by Blue Sky Studios. It stars the voices of Jesse Eisenberg, Anne Hathaway, will.i.am, Jamie Foxx, George Lopez, Tracy Morgan, Jemaine Clement, Leslie Mann, Rodrigo Santoro and Jake T. Austin. Rio 2 was Blue Sky's only G-rated sequel and Blue Sky's only sequel outside of Ice Age. == Cast == * Jesse Eisenberg as Blu * Anne Hathaway as Jewel * Leslie Mann as Linda * Jemaine Clement as Nigel * Kristin Chenoweth as Gabi * George Lopez as Rafael * Jamie Foxx as Nico * will.i.am as Pedro * Bruno Mars as Roberto * Andy Garcia as Eduardo * Tracy Morgan as Luis * Rodrigo Santoro as Tulio * Jake T. Austin as Fernando * Rita Moreno as Aunt Mimi * Rachel Crow as Carla * Kate Micucci as Tiny * Jeffrey Garcia as Spoonbill * Billy West as a Capoeira Turtle * Eric Bauza as an old bird * Jess Harnell as a Blue Sentry * Tara Strong as an Opera bird * Nancy Cartwright as Claira * Grey DeLisle as a coin toss bird * Bernardo De Paula as a carnival barker * Jason Harris Katz as an old bird * Jim Conroy as a Capoeira Turtle * Amandla Stenberg as Bia * Pierce Gagnon as Tiago * Miguel Ferrer as Big Boss * Amy Heidemann as a rapping sloth * Philip Lawrence as Felipe * Janelle Mon√°e as Dr. Monae * Natalie Morales as a news anchor * Bebel Gilberto as Eva * Carlinhos Brown as an audition bird * Nesho from Plim Plim makes a cameo on the poster, which is what the birds are standing on. ==Sequel== In January 2022, it was confirmed that a third Rio film is in development. == References == == Other websites == * * * * * Category:2010s sequel movies Category:2014 computer-animated movies Category:2014 comedy movies Category:American animated movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Movies about dogs Category:Movies about birds Category:Jungle movies Category:Movies set in Brazil Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Carlos Saldanha Category:Blue Sky Studios movies Category:Rio (franchise)
title: Rio 2
